LanguageData.MakePizza.label: 烘焙披萨
LanguageData.MakePizza.description: Bakes a pizza from flour, cheese and tomatoes. Scrumptious! Produces 1.
LanguageData.MakeCheeseGrilled.label: 烤芝士三明治
LanguageData.MakeCheeseGrilled.description: Grills a sandwich from bread and cheese. Produces 1.
LanguageData.MakeBurgerCheese.label: 烹饪芝士汉堡
LanguageData.MakeBurgerCheese.description: Cooks a burger made from bread, meat and cheese. Delicious! Produces 1.
LanguageData.MakePieBlueberry.label: 烘焙浆果派
LanguageData.MakePiePumpkin.label: 烘焙南瓜派
LanguageData.MakePiePumpkin.description: Stuff the intestines of pumpkins into dough to 制造 sweet aromatic pies. Produces 5.
LanguageData.MakeTaffy.label: 烹制太妃糖
LanguageData.MakeTaffy.description: Turns sugar into taffy. Taffy is a type of sweet, chewable candy. Produces 4.
LanguageData.MakeCookies.label: 烘焙巧克力曲奇
LanguageData.MakeCookies.description: Bakes cookies from flour, sugar and chocolate; using grandma's recipe. Produces 5.
LanguageData.MakeSweetBun.label: 烘焙甜面包卷
LanguageData.MakeSweetBun.description: Bakes sweet rolls covered in sugary icying. Produces 5.
LanguageData.BakeCornbread.label: 烘焙玉米面包 (2x)
LanguageData.BakeCornbread.description: Bake a tasty cornbread loaf. Produces 2.
LanguageData.BakeCornbreadmuffin.label: 烘焙玉米松饼 (3x)
LanguageData.BakeCornbreadmuffin.description: Bake some tasty cornbread muffins. Produces 3.
